SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into rushbuy (shoesid, begintime, endtime, rbprice, rbamount) values (#{shoesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rbprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rbamount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update rushbuy set shoesid = #{shoesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, begintime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rbprice = #{rbprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rbamount = #{rbamount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where rushbuyid = #{rushbuyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select rushbuyid, shoesid, begintime, endtime, rbprice, rbamount from rushbuy
